revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #40 Rindo |image = [[File:Rindo.png]] |caption = This Berry has a disagreeable "green" flavor and scent typical of vegetables. It is rich in health-promoting fiber. It has a tendency to expand into nearby plots. |growtime = 8h 0m 0s |harvest = 24 berries |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 1,400 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }}
'''Rindo''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, at least 15, but no more than 20 points of bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry.

N/A ||
0.04% |}

16 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 5 hours 20 mins -
10 hours 40 mins || 64 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 3 hours 33 mins 20 secs -
7 hours 6 mins 40 secs || 43 mulch |}

Note: Figy and Aguav have equivalent growth times.
